generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb.
- building: A modern multi-story building with large windows is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are present along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible alongside the road and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: Several pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- pole: Traffic light poles are visible on both sides of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are mounted on poles at the intersection.
- traffic sign: A small traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road.
- car: The front of a car, including the Mercedes-Benz emblem, is visible at the bottom of the image.
